question: What is the radian value of the angle between Line_A_B and Line_C_A at vertex A?
qt_description: Angle B-A-C by Line_A_B & Line_C_A at A (New edges: 1=False, 2=False) (Expr Length: 4)
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 3-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 9, rotation angle pi/3 radians. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed circle (center O1) around 3-sided polygon. Round 2: applying 'translation' rule. Translation derivation: circle (new center O2) translated right. Found 6 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 8 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 3, total arcs: 10, total points: 6.
增强结果序号: 3/4
本结果操作轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Draw perpendicular from point B to line L2 (foot F0 on segment)
generated_question: In the given geometric construction, two circles intersect at points A and C, with centers O1 and O2 respectively. Point B lies on the circumference of the circle centered at O1, forming triangle ABC. A perpendicular is drawn from point B to the line segment AC, meeting it at foot point F0. Given that triangle ABC is equilateral with side length 9 and was constructed by circumscribing a circle around a regular 3-sided polygon centered at O1, then translating the circle to center O2, determine the radian measure of ∠BAC — the angle between segments AB and AC at vertex A.
